metadata.title: CVE-2017-0529 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the MediaTek driver could enablea local malicious application to access data outside of its permissionlevels. This issue is rated as High because it could be used to accesssensitive data without explicit user permission. Product: Android.Versions: N/A. Android ID: A-28449427. References: M-ALPS02710042.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
